reviews.title: Why always running in the background?
reviews.comment: Since the most recent patch, the game it\'s constantly running in the background burning resources.  It never used to do this before, and I am growing tired of task killing it.  Please fix...about to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad on xperia z
reviews.comment: Audio sucks, ruins the potential of being a super cool shooting game, I want more bullet sounds Controls are okay, just need to adjust the settings
reviews.author: Maggie Li

reviews.title: Awsome...please push this game to a next level.
reviews.comment: Hope to see this actions on such galaxy future smart phone. Keeps on going developer.
reviews.author: Kok cheng Lim

reviews.title: Huge Surprise
reviews.comment: Turret gunners were never my favorite game type but if any game were to change that, it would be this one. This game is so well done that there is very little that could be done to improve it. There are very few games that I can say this about. The use of duel independent fire is brilliantly executed.
reviews.author: David Hooks

reviews.title: Crummy game
reviews.comment: Inverted Y axis is acceptable on a joystick, but on a mobile device? Why is that the default?  Also, the gameplay gets boring fast. It wore out its welcome after 10 minutes, and will now be uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why the ads?
reviews.comment: I\'m confused. I paid for this game and I still get this big huge banner ads appearing?  I thought the point of paying for it was to get rid of the ads?  Anyway, it\'s a cool game, rather, but the ads are annoying considering I paid for the game.
reviews.author: Kristofer Brozio

reviews.title: Greater Defensive Shooter!
reviews.comment: If you have a solid device and like earth defense shooters, then this game is for you. Runs great on HTC Vivid, One X & Sammy S3. I didn\'t like this game until I played it on a high end device.  It also works awesome on Nexus 7, Nexus 10 & the Note 10.1.  Great graphics & a fast paced game that is very addictive!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs Nvidia Shield support
reviews.comment: leave the \"virtual analogs\" for  Angry Birds casual gamers...come on this game is for HARDCORE GAMERS.Add Nvidia Shield, Moga and XBOX controller support to be among the REAL DEAL current games. MY 5 stars then, and thousands of accurate sales...
reviews.author: Mauro Gonzalez

reviews.title: Definitely not for tablets
reviews.comment: I tried to play this today on my TF300T. When using the tilt movement, no matter what direction I moved or pointed my tablet, it always stayed pointing at the horizon, even after \"calibrating\" in the Pause screen. Decided to give the touch movement a try, but it was hardly any better, being very hard to move, unresponsive, and unfriendly to use. Plus, the graphics were all fairly low-quality, looking more akin to DOOM than something \"3D\". I\'m sure this game is great on a phone, but definitely not a tablet.
reviews.author: Denham Crafton

reviews.comment: I installed it, but when i tried to open it, it kept going to my homescreen...?

reviews.comment: Good gameplay. Loads of fun. Downside is adds.
